text: If any provision of this subchapter or of the regulations promulgated under the authority of this subchapter is held invalid, such invalidity shall not affect other provisions either of this subchapter or of the said regulations which can be effected without the invalid provisions, and to this end the provisions of this subchapter and the said regulations are separable.
